experience.bankMainTitleDescription: Frontend developer, Scrum Master, and team leader at Bank Leumi, one of Israel's largest banks. I played a key role in developing the bank's new main business website, starting from the proof of concept (POC) phase through to the minimum viable product (MVP), public launch, and ongoing development.
experience.faiDescription: Served as an on-site advisor at a Toronto-based startup. Prior to that, I remotely developed a proof of concept (POC) customer portal with user registration and login functionality.
